project.name: |-- 001-static-nested-classes
project.description:
Keywords: + Static Nested Classes
This project includes a couple of very simple examples involving static nested classes:
StaticNestedTestRunner: Demonstrates how an static nested class can access private static members of the outer class, and how an static class can be instantiated without instantiating its enclosing class.
StaticNestedTestRunner: Demonstrates how an static nested class can define a member whose name clashes with a member name of the enclosing class, and how you can reference the outer class member when this happens.
The classes include simple runners that can be executed as java programs.
